Hello, I'm

George Moseti Gwaro

Senior Software Engineer

Kenyan-born software engineer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications and distributed systems. Passionate about leveraging technology to drive innovation in Africa and beyond. Currently focused on cloud architecture and mentoring the next generation of African engineers.

About Me

I'm a Senior Software Engineer born and raised in Kenya, with a passion for building scalable distributed systems and cloud-native applications. My journey started in Nairobi, where I discovered my love for programming during my university years at Nairobi University.

Over the past 8 years, I've had the privilege of working with leading tech companies including Google and Microsoft, contributing to products that impact millions of users globally. I specialize in fullstack development, cloud architecture, and more recently, in mentoring young African engineers to break into the tech industry.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me contributing to open-source projects, speaking at tech meetups in Nairobi, or writing technical articles about software engineering best practices. I believe in the power of technology to transform Africa and am committed to giving back to my community through education and mentorship.

8+ Years Experience
50+ Projects Delivered
10M+ Users Served

Services

I help businesses transform ideas into powerful digital solutions. Here's what I can do for you.

Custom Software Development

Tailor-made applications built from the ground up to solve your specific business challenges. From MVPs to enterprise-grade solutions.

  • Full-stack web applications
  • Mobile apps (iOS & Android)
  • API development & integration
  • Legacy system modernization

Cloud Architecture & DevOps

Scalable, secure cloud infrastructure designed for performance and cost-efficiency. I build systems that grow with your business.

  • AWS, GCP, Azure architecture
  • Kubernetes & containerization
  • CI/CD pipeline setup
  • Infrastructure as Code (Terraform)

Technical Consulting

Strategic advice on technology decisions, architecture reviews, and team mentorship. I help you avoid costly mistakes.

  • Architecture review & optimization
  • Tech stack selection
  • Code audits & best practices
  • Team training & mentoring

MVP Development

Get your product to market fast with a minimum viable product. Validate your idea before investing heavily.

  • Rapid prototyping
  • Lean development approach
  • User feedback integration
  • Launch & iterate strategy
